_header: Of Lenten in the first morning
_description: William Dunbar, ‘All erdly joy returnis in pane’ — ten quatrains with this refrain

CamMagPep2553.First Lines:
Off lentren In þe first moirnyngAirlie as did þe day
                    vpspring…
CamMagPep2553.Last Lines:
…ffor vþer ioy is all bot vaneall warldlie Ioy returnis
                    in pane
CamMagPep2553.Editions:
Craigie,  William Alexander. 
             The Maitland Folio Manuscript, Containing Poems by Sir Richard
                Maitland, Dunbar, Douglas, Henryson, and others.
             2 vols. 
             Scottish Text Society
         n.s. 7 (1919), 20 (1927); Edinburgh and London: Blackwood, 1919,
            1927: 1.382-3.

Banna.First Lines:
Off lentren in the first mornyngAirly as did þe day vp
                    spring…
Banna.Last Lines:
…ffor vder Ioy is all bot vaneAll erdly Ioy returnis in
                    pane
